alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:52AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gulf, southeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 745 AM EDT/645 AM CDT/... At 652 AM EDT/552 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Blountstown to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Quincy, Blountstown, Springfield, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Gretna, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper and Douglas City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty
